description: EXAMPLE: Test the coordination system by checking in
instructions:
1. Update status/clawsy-status.json with your actual info
2. Move this task to in-progress/ while working
3. When done, move to completed/ and add result field
4. Commit and push

This tests the full workflow!

result.message: Coordination system verified. Clawsy running in Docker on TrueNAS, workspace at /home/node/.openclaw/workspace. Ready to collaborate!
